page.title: 10MOYSES NURSERY / SETTING
page.content: Moyses Nursery covers 4.5 acres of land.Much of this is covered by glasshouses the remainder is taken up by the owners house and an outside growing area for bedding plants. In total there are 8 glasshouses and over 15500 square metres of glass.the main glasshouse is 115 feet long and 65 feet wide.The glasshouses are fitted with automatic ventilators and watering equipment. Although it is a family business they employ 2 full time staff and 3 part time staff.They work for 364.5 days a year although the shop is not open all this time. The shop opens at 8am and closes at 7pm. It relies on both passing trade and regular customers.Some of their produce is sold at covent garden.They also sell other products such as pottery which is made locally.
